title: Looking for free PBE account
body: Can anyone please spare me a NA (PBE) so i can play kindred, i really want to play them, and im so jealous when NA has PBE and OCE doesnt, PLEASE <3

replies.body:
Ease up mate. There was a time oce servers didn't exist and thus every oce player played on NA servers. LOTS of us have pbe accounts.

Edit - what a 'toxic ass mindset'
I'm almost tempted to give this guy my account just to spite you and your shit attitude
You'd actually be surprised how many people in OCE have PBE accounts.

BTW, just so you know as long as you have a level 30 account with honour level 3+ you can create a free PBE account :)

Its not just open to OCE anymore. 

https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe
can u plz give me information for a oceania pie account
Sorry everyone, its just i live in a small town, and the internet here is really slow, and my max download speed is 120 kb/s, so im really sorry that i was being a selfish "toxic ass mindset."

> so im really sorry that i was being a selfish "toxic ass mindset."

Just FYI, that comment was actually directed at GigaPube, not you.

Heh.. When I made my PBE account in season 2 I had to wait an agonizing 6 seconds for it to be activated.
Things were tough back then

I don't think it's fair for you to be 'given' a free PBE account when there are literally 1000s of players on the waiting list. If you want a PBE account you need to do it the same way everyone else does and register.
Asking for a free PBE account is like asking for a Diamond 1 account for free.
